Articles.Content:
Heho everyone!

I bought my version of KSP on steam and I heard that they are "moving over" to the unity engine?

My question is - how is this going to impact my steam version? will I have to re-buy it or will it simply be a patch that removes the old engine and puts in the new one ?

PS: I finally made my very first Mun landing where my crew survived ! I also had enough fuel to get them back home safely Now then, time to build a Mun base

They are already on Unity (and always have been ). The moving over was from Unity 3 to Uniy 4, which has already happened with 0.19, so you've already been transferred - no need to worry!

All updates through steam are identical to the normal Squad Store, so you won't have to re-buy any new updates. But remember as KSP is still Alpha, currently future updates may/may not kill your persistance and craft files (you can try copying and pasting them into the new game update, but it doesn't always work)!

And well done on your first landing! It gets easier to do everything else from now on (I found anyway ).
